name: Brunello di Montalcino Banfi 2019
description: Premium Brunello with complex notes of cherry, leather, and spice. Aged to perfection with firm tannins and a long, elegant finish.

name: Sequoia Grove Cabernet Sauvignon Napa Valley 2020
description: Luxury Napa Cabernet with blackcurrant, cassis, and mocha. Rich, full-bodied with polished tannins and exceptional depth.

name: Cloudy Bay Pinot Noir 2022
description: Elegant Pinot Noir with red cherry, wild strawberry, and subtle oak. Silky texture with vibrant acidity and a long finish.

name: Cloudy Bay Chardonnay 2022
description: Premium Chardonnay with stone fruit, citrus, and subtle oak. Rich and balanced with a creamy texture.

name: Sequoia Grove Chardonnay 2021
description: Rich, opulent Chardonnay with baked apple, vanilla, and toasted oak. Full-bodied with a long, buttery finish.

name: Margaux de Brane 2019
description: Classic Margaux with cassis, violet, and fine-grained tannins. Elegant and refined with great aging potential.

name: Frank Phélan Saint-Estèphe 2018
description: Powerful Saint-Estèphe with dark fruit, graphite, and structured tannins. On sale - exceptional value.

name: Château Lilian Ladouys Saint-Estèphe 2019
description: Elegant Saint-Estèphe with blackcurrant, cedar, and supple tannins. On sale - outstanding quality.

name: Labastide Dauzac Margaux 2021
description: Refined Margaux with floral notes, red fruit, and silky tannins. Approachable yet complex.

name: Cloudy Bay Sauvignon Blanc 2024
description: Iconic Sauvignon Blanc with passionfruit, citrus, and fresh herbs. Crisp, vibrant, and intensely aromatic.

name: Barolo DOCG Patres
description: Classic Barolo with tar, roses, and firm tannins. Complex and age-worthy Nebbiolo expression.

name: Chablis "La Sereine"
description: Unoaked Chardonnay with green apple, lemon zest, and chalky minerality. Pure and precise.

name: Piedra Negra Malbec Alta Colección 2024
description: Premium Malbec with blackberry, plum, and spice. Rich and full-bodied with velvety tannins.

name: Rupert & Rothschild Classique 2009
description: Aged Bordeaux-style blend with dark fruit, tobacco, and elegant structure. Well-developed complexity.

name: Vale D. Maria Douro Superior 2022
description: Portuguese red blend with dark fruit, spice, and mineral notes. Rich and structured.

name: Faustino I Gran Reserva 2015
description: Aged Gran Reserva with leather, spice, and dried fruit. Complex and elegant with polished tannins.

name: Château Tour de Perrigal Bordeaux Supérieur 2021
description: Classic Bordeaux with cassis, plum, and gentle oak. Well-balanced and approachable.

name: Conde Valdemar Rioja Crianza Reserva 2017
description: Award-winning Rioja with 91 points. Cherry, vanilla, and spice with silky tannins and great balance.

name: Rioja Vega Crianza 2021
description: Irish Wine of the Year winner. Ripe cherry, vanilla, and sweet spice. Exceptional value.

name: Lolo Albariño
description: Irish Wine of the Year winner. Sea-breeze minerality with peach and citrus. Perfect with seafood.

name: Ébano 6 Ribera del Duero
description: Powerful Tempranillo with dark fruit, spice, and firm structure. Rich and concentrated.

name: Esporão Reserva Tinto Organic 2022
description: Organic Portuguese blend with dark fruit, spice, and earthy notes. Rich and full-bodied.

name: Terrazas de los Andes Malbec 2022
description: High-altitude Malbec with blackberry, plum, and spice. Smooth and approachable.

name: Terrazas de los Andes Chardonnay 2024
description: Crisp Chardonnay with citrus, stone fruit, and mineral notes. Fresh and balanced.

name: Portillo Malbec 2022
description: Juicy Malbec with blackberry, plum, and soft tannins. Great value and crowd-pleasing.

name: Fin del Mundo Malbec 2022
description: Cool-climate Malbec with fresh black fruit and spice. Elegant and refined.

name: Whispering Angel Rosé
description: Iconic Provence rosé with strawberry, white peach, and a dry, crisp finish. Perfect summer wine.

name: Sancerre 2023
description: Classic Sancerre with citrus, gooseberry, and flinty minerality. Crisp and refreshing.

name: Louis Jadot Mâcon-Lugny 2023
description: Unoaked Chardonnay with apple, citrus, and mineral notes. Clean and elegant.

name: Crozes-Hermitage Delas 2022
description: Northern Rhône Syrah with black pepper, dark fruit, and spice. Structured and elegant.

name: Bertani Valpolicella Ripasso
description: Rich Ripasso with cherry, spice, and dried fruit notes. Full-bodied and warming.

name: Castello di Albola Chianti Classico
description: Classic Chianti with sour cherry, leather, and savoury notes. Food-friendly and elegant.

name: Valmoissine Pinot Noir Louis Latour 2022
description: Elegant Pinot Noir with red fruit, florals, and silky texture. Approachable and refined.

name: Grand Veneur Côtes du Rhône 2023
description: Juicy Grenache-led blend with raspberry, pepper, and soft tannins. Great value.

name: Rupert & Rothschild Baroness Nadine Chardonnay 2023
description: Premium Chardonnay with stone fruit, vanilla, and subtle oak. Rich and balanced.

name: Domaine Gueneau Sancerre "La Guiberte" 2024
description: Single-vineyard Sancerre with intense citrus, flint, and mineral notes. Precision and elegance.

name: Assyrtiko Papagiannakos
description: Greek white with citrus, mineral, and saline notes. Crisp and distinctive.

name: Geyerhof Stockwerk Grüner Veltliner
description: Austrian classic with white pepper, citrus, and stone fruit. Fresh and food-friendly.

name: Geyerhof Stockwerk Zweigelt
description: Juicy Austrian red with red berries and gentle spice. Versatile and approachable.

name: Pasqua ZIN Primitivo
description: Bold Primitivo with dark fruit, spice, and full body. Great value and crowd-pleasing.

name: Pasqua Morago Appassite
description: Rich, concentrated red with dried fruit, spice, and sweet notes. Unique and interesting.

name: Barahonda Organic Monastrell–Merlot 2018
description: Organic blend with dark fruit, spice, and smooth tannins. Rich and approachable.

name: Corazón de Lolita Premium Coupage
description: Gold Medal winner. Rich blend with dark fruit, spice, and smooth tannins. Great value.

name: Protos Verdejo 2024
description: Crisp Verdejo with citrus, fennel, and mineral notes. Fresh and zippy.

name: Picpoul de Pinet Domaine de la Madone 2023
description: Coastal white with citrus, sea salt, and mineral notes. Perfect with oysters.

name: Viore Verdejo Sobre Lias 2022
description: Lees-aged Verdejo with citrus, fennel, and creamy texture. Rich and balanced.

name: Lagar de Besada Albariño
description: Fresh Albariño with peach, lime, and saline notes. Great value and approachable.

name: Bread & Butter Pinot Noir 2023
description: Smooth Pinot Noir with cherry, raspberry, and soft tannins. Approachable and versatile.

name: Bread & Butter Chardonnay 2023
description: Rich Chardonnay with apple, vanilla, and subtle oak. Smooth and balanced.

name: 3 Wooly Sheep Sauvignon Blanc
description: Fresh Sauvignon Blanc with citrus, passionfruit, and herbs. Crisp and vibrant.

name: Faustino VII Blanco
description: Fresh white Rioja with citrus and stone fruit. Light and approachable.

name: Faustino VII Tempranillo
description: Young Tempranillo with fresh cherry fruit and soft tannins. Great everyday wine.

name: Faustino V Reserva
description: Aged Reserva with cherry, vanilla, and spice. Well-balanced and elegant.

name: Lafage Miraflors Blanc
description: Fresh white blend with citrus and stone fruit. Crisp and approachable.

name: Lafage Miraflors Rosé
description: Fresh rosé with strawberry and citrus notes. Dry and refreshing.

name: Lafage Miraflors Red
description: Juicy red blend with dark fruit and spice. Approachable and versatile.

name: Salisbury 1848 Chardonnay 2024
description: Australian Chardonnay with stone fruit, citrus, and subtle oak. Balanced and elegant.

name: Hans Baer Riesling Trocken
description: Dry German Riesling with lime, slate, and crisp acidity. Fresh and food-friendly.

name: Plaimont Colombelle Tannat Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Unique blend of Tannat and Cabernet Sauvignon from South West France. Dark fruit, spice, and structured tannins. Distinctive and full-bodied.

name: Bargemone Rosé
description: Quality Provence rosé with delicate strawberry, citrus, and mineral notes. Elegant and refined with a dry, crisp finish.

name: Boutinot Mal.bek Rosé
description: Unique Malbec rosé with vibrant red fruit, floral notes, and refreshing acidity. Distinctive and approachable.

name: Les Cerisiers Côtes du Rhône Rosé
description: Fresh Côtes du Rhône rosé with cherry, raspberry, and herbal notes. Juicy and food-friendly.

name: Corte delle Calli Rosé Spumante
description: Italian sparkling rosé with fine bubbles, red berry fruit, and crisp acidity. Elegant and festive.

name: Integral 3 Unfiltered
description: Unfiltered wine with intense fruit expression and natural texture. Rich, complex, and distinctive. Natural winemaking approach.

name: La Marca Prosecco
description: Popular Prosecco with fine bubbles, pear, and apple fruit. Fresh, crisp, and approachable. Great value.

name: Valdo Bio Prosecco
description: Organic Prosecco with fresh citrus, white flowers, and fine bubbles. Clean, elegant, and environmentally conscious.

name: 1928 Prosecco DOC Frizzante Carvicchioli e Figli
description: Premium Prosecco with gentle frizzante bubbles, citrus, and stone fruit. Elegant and refined with heritage quality.

name: Valdo Prosecco Rosé Brut
description: Prosecco rosé with fine bubbles, red berry fruit, and crisp acidity. Fresh, elegant, and distinctive.

name: Montegrande Prosecco
description: Quality Prosecco with fresh pear, apple, and floral notes. Crisp, refreshing, and well-balanced.

name: Millage Prosecco DOC Treviso
description: Prosecco DOC from Treviso with citrus, white peach, and fine bubbles. Fresh and approachable.
